definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: The weekly criteria hits every single turn in the market within a couple of weeks.
sentences.chinese: 每週標準支安打在市場上每一轉幾個星期內。

sentences.english: Wang allowed four runs, six hits and three walks in six innings .
sentences.chinese: 小民被得四分，六局中被打六支安打跟三個保送。

sentences.english: The Mets loaded the bases with two singles and a base on balls.
sentences.chinese: 麥茲隊以兩支安打和一次保送而佔滿壘。

sentences.english: Wang responded in the fourth with a 10-pitch fourth that included a broken-bat bloop single.
sentences.chinese: 小王在第四局中投了10球，包括一支中外野的安打。

sentences.english: This split is based on a delimiter i. e. whenever the timestamp hits midnight.
sentences.chinese: 這個分裂是基於一個分隔符即每當午夜時間戳支安打。

sentences.english: Pettitte worked 7 1/3 innings, allowing two runs and nine hits.
sentences.chinese: 小派投了七又三分之一局，被敲出九支安打掉了兩分。

sentences.english: Quality is more important than quantity. One home run is much better than two doubles.
sentences.chinese: 品質比量重要，一支全壘打比兩支二壘安打好許多。

sentences.english: Wang responded in the fourth with a 10 - pitch fourth that included a broken - bat bloop single.
sentences.chinese: 小王在第四局中投了10球，包括一支中外野的安打。

sentences.english: Bunts and singles are what win ball games.
sentences.chinese: 在棒球賽裏，短打和一壘安打纔是制勝的根本。

definition: to strike out/strikeout (baseball, softball)/(Tw) to ditch/to eliminate from consideration
Malong county in Qujing 曲靖[Qu3 jing4], Yunnan
